privacy_intro_content: This Privacy Policy describes how Islamic App collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our application.
privacy_data_collection_content: We collect information you provide directly such as your name, email address, and profile picture when you create an account. We also collect usage data and location information with your permission for features like prayer times and mosque locator.
privacy_data_usage_content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, send prayer time notifications, personalize your experience, and enable community features. We never sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy_data_storage_content: Your data is stored securely using Firebase services with industry-standard encryption. Some data is cached locally on your device for offline access.
privacy_data_sharing_content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except when required by law or with your explicit consent. Community posts you create are visible to other users.
privacy_user_rights_content: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data at any time. You can also opt-out of notifications and data collection features through the app settings.
privacy_security_content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy_changes_content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy in the app. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy_contact_content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at support@islamicapp.com
faq_how_to_use_app: How do I use this app?
faq_how_to_use_app_answer: Navigate through the app using the bottom navigation bar. Access Quran, Hadith, Prayer Times, Qibla direction, and more. Create an account to unlock community features and sync your data.
faq_prayer_times_accuracy_answer: Prayer times are calculated based on your device location using the Aladhan API. Ensure location permissions are enabled for accurate times. You can adjust calculation methods in settings.
faq_qibla_direction: Why is the Qibla direction not accurate?
faq_qibla_direction_answer: The Qibla compass requires access to your device's compass sensor and location. Make sure to calibrate your device compass and hold it flat. Keep away from magnetic interference.
faq_notifications: How do I enable prayer notifications?
faq_notifications_answer: Go to Settings > Notifications and toggle prayer notifications on. Make sure notification permissions are enabled in your device settings.
faq_account_delete: How can I delete my account?
faq_account_delete_answer: Go to Profile > Account Settings > Delete Account. This action is permanent and will remove all your data from our servers.
faq_report_issue: How do I report a problem?
faq_report_issue_answer: You can contact our support team via email at support@islamicapp.com. Please provide detailed information about the issue including screenshots if possible.
support_team_available: Our support team is here to help you. Feel free to reach out anytime!
